name: HackQuest
fullText:
HackQuest @ Nairobi Mini Hack 🇰🇪

This overnight sprint brought together:
👥 130 hackers with expert mentors
🛠️ 22 teams who built & shipped
🚀 22 projects across 3 tracks → Scaffold_ETH | MultiBaas | Sui

From concept to code to impact — all in just 12 hours ⚡️

Big shoutout to https://t.co/4TJz4ng5oJ
